passage_text: There is a marked difference with which the two words, growth and development, can be used. What is Growth? Growth is taken to mean an increase in the size of an object or a living being.

For products, the life cycle consists of introduction, growth, maturity and decline. A manufacturer's marketing objectives for a product often depend upon what stage of the life cycle the product has entered. When a company introduces a new product to the marketplace, its primary objective is to create a market for it.

Different types of business aims and objectives. An aim or objective is a statement of what a business is trying to achieve over the next 12 months. For example, a business can set itself any of these targets: A new cafe may just aim to survive its first year. 1  survival. 2  increased profit. 3  growth.4  increasing market share.n aim or objective is a statement of what a business is trying to achieve over the next 12 months. The growth and income objective for mutual funds is a combination of one part growth and one part income. Learn more with this simple overview. The growth and income objective for mutual funds is a combination of one part growth and one part income.

Central Bank systems is a important part of any economy. It decides how much money to be printed in that country. The interest rates are derived by their objectives like growth targeting, Inflation targeting, currency conversion targeting. When a central banks objective is growth of the country at a certain growth pace, then they are targeting towards growth.
